headline: U.S. Set to Ban Vaping Flavors Teens Use Most
abstract: The tobacco and vaping industries and conservative allies intensively lobbied against a ban on popular flavored e-cigarettes.
lead_paragraph: The Trump administration is expected to announce this week that it will ban mint-, fruit- and dessert-flavored e-cigarette cartridges popular with teenagers, but allow menthol and tobacco flavors to remain on the market.
